channel.title: twitterbootstrap on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in twitterbootstrap on Alfred Nutile

item.title: Refinery CMS and Twitter Bootstrap
item.description: This worked out quite easily on a project that I am working on. (not yet released) At the command line I had to run the needed code to copy the views to my app. Here are some commands I ran thoug this command rake refinery:override will show other options as well. rake refinery:override view=refinery/_site_bar rake refinery:override view=refinery/_content_page rake refinery:override view=refinery/_menu rake refinery:override view=refinery/_head
